body_html:
Ok, I've updated to check (1) exact matching of event_shape and (2) broadcastable to batch_shape.

@apaszke I tried to use torch._C._infer_size() as you suggest but it does not yet support empty sizes. We can switch to that once empty sizes are supported.
body_text:
Ok, I've updated to check (1) exact matching of event_shape and (2) broadcastable to batch_shape.
@apaszke I tried to use torch._C._infer_size() as you suggest but it does not yet support empty sizes. We can switch to that once empty sizes are supported.
body:
Ok, I've updated to check (1) exact matching of event_shape and (2) broadcastable to batch_shape.

@apaszke I tried to use `torch._C._infer_size()` as you suggest but it does not yet support empty sizes. We can switch to that once empty sizes are supported.
